post.title: CNET Picks Up Outlook Integration Sample News
post.title_plain: CNET Picks Up Outlook Integration Sample News
post.content: I couldn’t blog about the Outlook Integration Sample last week because we were waiting to see if the mainstream media would pick up the news. CNET ran an article about the sample today. There’s also a link to the Customer Explorer case study that was the original inspiration for the Outlook Integration Sample and VSTO Outlook in the first place.
